filter.Grayscale

filter. filter.Grayscale

new filter.Grayscale

Grayscale filter.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
scaleFactor, mixed

number, 0 - 1. If omitted, defaultValue is 1.
Example
   var f = new filter.Grayscale();
   var f = new filter.Grayscale(1);
